CustomField.description: Annualised Group Parent Client Revenue / Average Tier 1 Regulatory Capital Held. This information is received in a feed from CRT.Once a month a file will be uploaded with YTD CROC data. The information will be extracted from Client Capital and Revenue. (US-1295)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Annualised Group Parent Client Revenue / Average Tier1 Regulatory Capital Held. This information is received in a feed from CRT. Once a month a file will be uploaded with YTD CROC data. The information will be extracted from the Client Capital and Revenue
CustomField.label: Current YTD Group Parent Client CROC (%)
